answers.answer: I needed an emerg c sec with my fist because his nose was facing down and it wasnt letting my cervix dialate my water broke halloween morning (2010) and i didnt have him utill nov 1st 6:13 pm. Afte so many hrs with my water broke and not dialating they had to get him out. Now preg with my second and already measuring big...
I had a csection because I developed preeclamplsia and they needed to get baby out before my body and baby were ready. Same reason for this one too.
I had an emergency c section because my daughtern flat line and was gone for almost 10 mins. I'll be having my third in April.
I had an emergency c section with my daughter because she reacted differently to the epidural and turned sideways in my belly for hours so the doctors said it was time get her out ...
I had to have a emergency cesarean on December 14, 2010. . . Due to SEVERE preeclampsia

I had an emergency csection too im a ftm reason was. When the doctors broke my water it was green from baby pooping inside but they left me there for over a day with my water broken i wasn't dilating past 8cm it took me two days to get to 8cm i started to get a fever and an infection which the doctors said it could of been passed on to baby when he was born they said he had inhaled some liquid so the took him to the nicu
i had a c-section with my first due to i was 3 days in the hospital trying to open to a ten ,when i did my son got stuck bc he was a big baby 10lb 1onz ! so ended up with the c-section

I went into labor on my own on a wednesday night (day after my due date) at 8pm, and then didn't progress. They put me on pitocin thursday afternoon. Broke my water friday morning. C section 3pm friday afternoon. Stayed at 4cm dialated the entire time. Epidural didn't work so I was put to sleep for the surgery.

question: How many of you were ftm and needed a csection? What was the reason for it?
title: csection
